name: Parasol Express
description:
Developed by Happy Ferret Studios, our first project together is about Avery, a child who's family has been possessed by evil spirits. In this 2D action platformer, beat down strange, malicious ghosts in haunted train cars and save your family!

Production: Demos Fotias, Myra Khan
Design: Demos Fotias, Zachary Wilmer
Level Design: Sean Tracy
Programming: Courtney Dozier, Demos Fotias
Art: Shawdy Hedayati, Zachary Wilmer

Special thanks to Justin Selgrad and Timothy McMillen
